frontpage.frontpage_slogan: Designing with Purpose, Developing with Precision
frontpage.first_about_section: As a passionate front-end developer and designer, I love combining creativity and functionality to craft clever, user-friendly websites. Based in Valdres, Norway, my work is often inspired by the stunning nature surrounding me.
frontpage.second_about_section: With a fresh education in web development and design, I bring a modern, responsive approach to every project. I focus on clean, intuitive interfaces that enhance user experience, while incorporating unique design elements drawn from the world around me. I’m excited to create innovative digital solutions that leave a lasting impression.

education_1.education_1_school: Noroff school of technology and digital media, online

project_1.project_1_description: Venue booking site and final exam. Built with React, TypeScript and Bootstrap. Users may book, post and administer venues.

project_2.project_1_description: Frameworks task built with React where users may add products to shopping cart, search individual products and checkout cart.

project_3.project_1_description: Auction site where users may post items and bid on other items. Built with Vanilla JS and Bootstrap.

project_4.project_1_description: Styling frameworks task built with Vanilla JS BootStrap. Users may post social media posts visible to other registered users.

project_5.project_1_description: First project exam. Blog site built with Vanilla JS and Wordpress for creating blog posts.

project_6.project_1_description: First semester project. Static website for a technical museum. Built with HTML and CSS.

project_7.project_1_description: First task during my studies. Static online store expanded into fetching products from an API and displaying. Built with HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS.

Services.services_text: These are some of the services I can offer. Feel free to contact me if these suit your needs.
